definition: regarding/as far as sth is concerned/with regards to
right/correct/couple/pair/towards/at/for/to face/opposite/to treat (sb a certain way)/to match together/to adjust/to fit/to suit/to answer/to reply/classifier: couple

sentences.english: This gave the Chinese people a better sense of balance in regard to this-worldlincss and other- worldliness .
sentences.chinese: 這使得中國人對於入世和出世具有良好的平衡感。

sentences.english: But as you know, for you own vision is not something that you reason about.
sentences.chinese: 但是，衆所周之，我們對於視覺本不需要推理。

sentences.english: Arts and Humanities, we are told, are useless for the making of technological innovation.
sentences.chinese: 我們被教導說藝術與人文對於技術革新是無用的。

sentences.english: In some extend, I am not a hypercritical person about food.
sentences.chinese: 在某種程度上，我對於食物是一點都不挑剔的。

sentences.english: He was very open about his inspiration and his plans for his career.
sentences.chinese: 對於他的夢想和職業生涯計劃，韓庚是很公開的。

sentences.english: For a boy of fourteen his own home is the only Paradise.
sentences.chinese: 對於一個十四歲的男孩來說，自己的家就像是個天堂。

sentences.english: As for the Song of tea, the tea dust finer, the higher the quality of its tea.
sentences.chinese: 而對於宋茶來說，茶末越細，其茶的品質就越高。

sentences.english: There should be absolutely no behavioral tracking of minors.
sentences.chinese: 對於未成年人應該是完全沒有的行爲跟蹤的。

sentences.english: It was also simpler for the manager.
sentences.chinese: 這對於管理者來說也更加簡單。

sentences.english: In men, low testosterone levels can cause a loss of bone mass.
sentences.chinese: 對於男性來說，睾丸激素低水平會導致骨量的流失。

sentences.english: For flat glass, heat tempering is most often used.
sentences.chinese: 對於平板玻璃，熱退火是最常用的。

sentences.english: While this is particularly true for primary cells, this technique can also be used for secondary cells.
sentences.chinese: 儘管對於原電池是這樣，該技術還可以用於蓄電池。

sentences.english: But for property buyers are concerned, it is common snipe mussels competing and profit.
sentences.chinese: 但對於購房者來講，卻是鷸蚌相爭，漁翁得利。

sentences.english: MR. LU’S fascination with war came from eight years of service in the Chinese Army.
sentences.chinese: 陸川對於戰爭的着迷緣於他當了八年兵。

sentences.english: For Lutfi, we scattered his ashes in the canal.
sentences.chinese: 對於陸，我們分散他的骨灰在運河。

sentences.english: We will take good care and properly protect the patients vulnerable.
sentences.chinese: 並且對於易受傷害患者予以優先照顧和妥善保護。

definition: right/correct/couple/pair/towards/at/for/to face/opposite/to treat (sb a certain way)/to match together/to adjust/to fit/to suit/to answer/to reply/classifier: couple
after all/all in all/when all is said and done/in the final analysis
not only (this one)/not just (...) but also
one's conduct/deed/activity/accomplishment/achievement/to act as/as (in the capacity of)/qua/to view as/to look upon (sth as)/to take sth to be
to have sth to do with/to relate to/related to/to concern/concerning
